game.name: A Week in Paradise
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Week in Paradise is an interactive narrative mystery. Discover the unusual circumstances of your arrival to a bar called Paradise, and drink through the night with the bar's charismatic regular. Each night, unravel the threads holding back memories in your dreams.
